attributes.action: Close schools in the UK because of coronavirus outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: I am a school teacher and I am very concerned about my older colleagues and the children. Other counties are closing schools. Why not us!?
attributes.background: There is strong evidence dating back to the black death to suggest that isolation is the best way to prevent a spread of infection. Close schools or opperate a 1,2,3 system for classes where group 1 isolate for 2 weeks, then group 2 and then group 3 to help combat infection spreading.
